add_library(tpcds_dbgen
    STATIC
    address.c
    address.h
    build_support.c
    build_support.h
    checksum.c
    columns.h
    config.h
    constants.h
    date.c
    date.h
    dbgen_version.c
    dbgen_version.h
    dcgram.c
    dcgram.h
    dcomp.c
    dcomp.h
    dcomp_params.h
    decimal.c
    decimal.h
    dist.c
    dist.h
    driver.c
    driver.h
    error_msg.c
    error_msg.h
    eval.c
    eval.h
    expr.c
    expr.h
    genrand.c
    genrand.h
    grammar.c
    grammar.h
    grammar_support.c
    grammar_support.h
    join.c
    keywords.c
    keywords.h
    list.c
    list.h
    load.c
    load.h
    mathops.h
    misc.c
    misc.h
    mkheader.c
    nulls.c
    nulls.h
    parallel.c
    parallel.h
    params.h
    permute.c
    permute.h
    porting.c
    porting.h
    pricing.c
    pricing.h
    print.c
    print.h
    QgenMain.c
    qgen_params.h
    query_handler.c

    release.c

    w_web_sales.h
    w_web_site.c
    w_web_site.h
    y.tab.c
    y.tab.h
)

target_include_directories(tpcds_dbgen
    PUBLIC
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
)

target_compile_definitions(
        tpcds_dbgen
        PUBLIC
        -DLINUX
)
